events.message: The applicant has successfully submitted the personal loan application for covering unexpected medical expenses.
The loan application was reviewed and categorised under personal loans due to the stated purpose related to medical treatment costs.
A loan officer has been assigned to manage the application and provide personalized assistance throughout the process.
The initial application review was conducted, checking completeness of submitted information and verifying applicant details.
Additional documents, including recent medical bills and proof of income, were requested to support the personal loan application.
The applicant submitted all required documents, including medical expenses and employer salary slips, as requested.
Credit check was completed and revealed a satisfactory credit score, supporting the loan application’s approval potential.
Risk assessment evaluated the financial risks associated with the loan and determined a moderate risk profile for the applicant.
A loan offer outlining terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule was presented to the applicant for consideration.
The applicant responded with questions regarding the repayment period and monthly installment options.
Due to applicant’s concerns, the case was escalated to senior management for review of potential flexible terms.
Following escalation, the loan was approved with slightly adjusted terms to better suit the applicant’s repayment capacity.
The approved loan amount was successfully funded to the applicant’s bank account for use towards medical expenses.
Follow-up contacted the applicant to ensure satisfaction with the loan disbursement and address any further queries.
The loan application case was officially closed after successful funding and completion of post-approval follow-ups.
